# H.A.R.V.E.S.T.

#### (Harvest And Reconnaissance Vehicle Employing Sadistic Techniques)

Update: only fixed mouse sensitivity issue that made it unplayable on some systems.

Made in 3 days for Ludum Dare 52 (though our time got slaughtered by Orthodox Christmas)

To put it simply, we need human heads!

Your goal is to glide the vehicle above the ground, aiming the HARVEST blades 

to appropriate height in order to severe heads, which will be collected in 

suction openings on sides of the vehicle.

### CONTROLS

A.D = left,right

W   = thrust upwards, also adds speed, you will only want to hold this now and then

LMB = fire lasers, used for getting the crowds out of flashing buildings

RMB = zoom and more accurate aim sensitivity

### SCORING

Heads = 10 points

Torsos cut in half = 1 point, due to additional costs of processing to get the head

People without legs = 0 points, meant to be the fuel but wasn't implemented

### TIPS

You must hit them with blades in order to reap the material. Hitting them with any 

other part of the ship will produce splatter sound and will yield zero points.

Remember to shoot the FLASHING buildings in order to get crowds to come out!

The key is in keeping the height at the neck level, it may take some practice. The sound clip player on contact will hint at which body part is cut.

Good luck!

PS: H.A.R.V.E.S.T. is a cutting-edge technology but is not meant to be driven by idiots,

if you run your nose into a building you will die!
